title: Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore         Kennesaw Mountain Bookstore.   The Kennesaw Mountain NBP bookstore is operated by Eastern National and is located in the park's Visitor Center. Visitors can find books, gifts, and souvenirs that relate to the battle of Kennesaw Mountain and the Civil War in general.  All items can be shipped for out of town customers by contacting an associate by phone at 678-331-1147.  The bookstore is open from 9am to 5pm seven days a week with the exception of New Year's day, Thanksgiving, and Christmas day.
